title: bergay
author: bergay
content: Need a suitable solution for the p2p section whenever I open the p2p for buying or selling the currency but not showing any currency..when I uninstall the binance app then again installed then worked but after few seconds again same problem.https://imageupload.io/H4EVCUmQHc8Roh3

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.created_time: October 12, 2023, 10:13:28 AMLast edit: October 12, 2023, 10:32:25 AM by Nwada001
comments.body: Check your network; network is one of the issues that makes that happen.If you have a bad network connection, it will be hard for you to see all the available pairs and the exchange rate on the P2P side. I have experienced this more than once, and each time I switch over to a stronger network, it works perfectly.Edit: I just switch over my P2P currency option to your local currency as seen in your screenshot to confirm if the error is from your Pair or not. But it’s not this is the sell order from my own view.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Quote from: bergay on October 12, 2023, 10:10:38 AMNeed a suitable solution for the p2p section whenever I open the p2p for buying or selling the currency but not showing any currency..when I uninstall the binance app then again installed then worked but after few seconds again same problem.By default, you should have the USDT offers for EUR showing. So what is not showing exactly? the list of currencies after you selected either EUR or USDT to switch to something else?If it's a network error as mentioned above, you should have get an error message displaying for a couple of seconds after you visit the P2P page.

comments.author: bergay
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on October 12, 2023, 10:19:52 AMQuote from: bergay on October 12, 2023, 10:10:38 AMNeed a suitable solution for the p2p section whenever I open the p2p for buying or selling the currency but not showing any currency..when I uninstall the binance app then again installed then worked but after few seconds again same problem.By default, you should have the USDT offers for EUR showing. So what is not showing exactly? the list of currencies after you selected either EUR or USDT to switch to something else?If it's a network error as mentioned above, you should have get an error message displaying for a couple of seconds after you visit the P2P page.Sir this is not a network issue because I am already using the binance app for trading and I never facing the issue of network

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Quote from: bergay on October 12, 2023, 10:10:38 AMNeed a suitable solution for the p2p section whenever I open the p2p for buying or selling the currency but not showing any currency..when I uninstall the binance app then again installed then worked but after few seconds again same problem.Quoted for better visibility (thanks to joker_josue's talkimg service).Let us know if Nwada001's advice solved your problem, or it was not the cause of your issue and you still need other solutions. Anyway, if you install the App and it works, I think that there is no problem with your coins but with the visualisation, so stay calm Edit: I've just read that it didn't work. As I said, don't worry, you'll solve it.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Quote from: bergay on October 12, 2023, 10:22:49 AMSir this is not a network issue because I am already using the binance app for trading and I never facing the issue of networkI just saw the screenshot. Since it doesn't look like you have any filters ON either,  you should probably contact the support and ask them for help.Alternatively, you can try to use the web version instead and trade using it for now: https://p2p.binance.com/en/trade/sell/USDT?fiat=PKR&payment=all-payments

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: bergay on October 12, 2023, 10:10:38 AMNeed a suitable solution for the p2p section whenever I open the p2p for buying or selling the currency but not showing any currency..when I uninstall the binance app then again installed then worked but after few seconds again same problem.https://imageupload.io/H4EVCUmQHc8Roh3Only what I know that can make Biannce to display abnormal is bad network. I have checked mine and it is working good. If not network, probably it might be your phone or your phone operating system. If you are using lower operating system or lower old small phone and your phone can not be upgraded to one of the lastest OS, buy a better device.

comments.author: Ahli38
comments.body: Quote from: bergay on October 12, 2023, 10:10:38 AMNeed a suitable solution for the p2p section whenever I open the p2p for buying or selling the currency but not showing any currency..when I uninstall the binance app then again installed then worked but after few seconds again same problem.https://imageupload.io/H4EVCUmQHc8Roh3Have you ever tried installing the Binance application on another device that you own. Sometimes this happens on some devices but not on others. Currently, I rarely encounter problems like that. But I have experienced it and it was a long time ago. Another problem is that a more stable network connection speed is needed. Because if the network connection is unstable, sometimes errors occur and some things are not displayed.Or you can close the application first and clean the cache and then reopen the Binance application. But more often cases like this are due to network connection problems.

comments.author: EL MOHA
comments.body: Quote from: bergay on October 12, 2023, 10:22:49 AMSir this is not a network issue because I am already using the binance app for trading and I never facing the issue of network Yeah this absolutely strange because I haven’t seen or heard of cases too. One could have said it’s probably update issue but that’s not how it works. The only thing that’s came to my mind is maybe you were logged out and when in you just went to the P2P section straight up and that will not show other currency. But that also doesn’t seem as a genuine reason to me. But for the time been you can actually try other decentralized platforms and take your money off Binance. Visit either AgroDesk or Bisq

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: bergay on October 12, 2023, 10:22:49 AMSir this is not a network issue because I am already using the binance app for trading and I never facing the issue of networkMaybe it has been a while since you used Binance Exchange, and they might have logged you out automatically. Try and re-login with your details and try again because there is no general issue related to this, although they do have network issues sometimes. I was logged out of my Binance app too; I just logged back in, updated my Binance app, and everything was working perfectly as usual. Maybe you will consider updating your application, or maybe they have restricted you from using their service.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: OP, I think the problem is that follow button next to the filter option. It probably means you are trying to view ads from only the traders you follow. There is a high chance that all the traders you follow have not posted any ad yet, thus the empty space. Try to disable it and see if it works

comments.author: bergay
comments.body: I didn't get a solvable answer for my problem.the people replying1.mobile is not updated2.app is not updated3.network problem4.log out and log inBut all the above mentioned cases I already done..but nothing else..same problem

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: Usually, website will detect your IP address and direct you to a local page based on your IP address then the local currency will be chose for you by default. It comes together with a language too so if you want to change language and currency for trading and user interface, you have to do it manually.In your case, no display for any currency at all so I believe it is a problem with your Internet connection like many people discussed.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: bergay on October 12, 2023, 10:10:38 AMNeed a suitable solution for the p2p section whenever I open the p2p for buying or selling the currency but not showing any currency..when I uninstall the binance app then again installed then worked but after few seconds again same problem.https://imageupload.io/H4EVCUmQHc8Roh3Maybe a glitch. Try go to settings, there is a need to pick which currency to use for p2p maybe you didnt set it up. But as far as I am concern its default is usd currency and you just replace it on the one you are using on your country.I didnt experience that kind of error before but I did experience its change the currency to something else so I just fixed it.

comments.author: Wakate
comments.body: Quote from: OcTradism on October 12, 2023, 11:02:40 AMUsually, website will detect your IP address and direct you to a local page based on your IP address then the local currency will be chose for you by default. It comes together with a language too so if you want to change language and currency for trading and user interface, you have to do it manually.In your case, no display for any currency at all so I believe it is a problem with your Internet connection like many people discussed. Sometimes even when exchange detect your IP address, that does not mean that they will be the one to choose what currency you will have to use and make transactions. After one has completed KYC on a centralized exchange, it is very important to choose currency which you will be using to make transactions because there are some people that are expatriate in another regions and because they submitted there documents for KYC, that does not mean that it is the currency of the country they come from is the one that they'll want to use for transactions. This is why we ought to choose currency by ourselves for transaction purposes.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: Quote from: Wakate on October 12, 2023, 12:22:12 PMSometimes even when exchange detect your IP address, that does not mean that they will be the one to choose what currency you will have to use and make transactions.Their system to detect your IP address and direct you to a local page for you can work or can not work at a time. You can see it even when you don't log in your account, visiting as a guest and they will open a local page for you, when their system works fine of course.QuoteAfter one has completed KYC on a centralized exchange, it is very important to choose currency which you will be using to make transactions because there are some people that are expatriate in another regions and because they submitted there documents for KYC, that does not mean that it is the currency of the country they come from is the one that they'll want to use for transactions. This is why we ought to choose currency by ourselves for transaction purposes. I know that. It's customization for your account and I agree with you that to save time, a user should customize some settings for an account. It can be done on exchanges don't require KYC too but it has become less popular because more exchanges do require KYC with time.They can not find against their governments and if governments have a condition like KYC, AML to continue a business, the exchange team have to trigger KYC requirement on their users.No-KYC Exchange Encyclopedia. Because they are centralized exchanges, their policies and terms of service can change anytime so I am always ready to do KYC if I use an account on a centralized platform.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: bergay on October 12, 2023, 10:56:34 AMI didn't get a solvable answer for my problem.the people replying1.mobile is not updated2.app is not updated3.network problem4.log out and log inBut all the above mentioned cases I already done..but nothing else..same problemDear, have you ever tried P2P or this is your first time or is it just today, you are getting this error. I mean, you did not mentioned that, if that's the first time, then they must have asked to you comply/agree with some agreement and might ask you to see some tutorial but obviously tutorial are optional. I can understand, you are not getting some useful answers. But we all are guessing the possible solutions. Are you from Pakistan, as I can see the PKR term in the top right corner. Just asking. Sometime, these are the issues of app and by clear the cache might solve it, but I doubt, you already have did that too. If still not find any listings, then try to change the currency, from USDT to BTC or try to change the mode from selling to buying then if you still face this issue then you should contact the support for help. I guess they can help you better. We can but we don't have the full information of your case. Thanks to Porfirii for quoting the image, as the image from the OP has been removed from the image hoster.

comments.author: TakeItEasy
comments.body: Quote from: bergay on October 12, 2023, 10:10:38 AMNeed a suitable solution for the p2p section whenever I open the p2p for buying or selling the currency but not showing any currency..when I uninstall the binance app then again installed then worked but after few seconds again same problem.https://imageupload.io/H4EVCUmQHc8Roh31. Open your Binance app and click on the 4 bars at the upper right corner of your screen on your Home Tab.2. Then, click on the Settings option at the top right corner of your screen.3. You will find a Language option there, click on it.4. Change your Language from English(Britain) to English only.5. That's it, enjoy the smooth features of P2P now.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: It's a common problem with binance p2p and I have experienced it multiple times.It's not due to connection isuues but connecting to a different network or turning off then on mobile data usually fixes the problem. You can also try opening a different tab then go back to the p2p tab and orders will appear again.Adding the p2p shortcut to home screen is also the best way to quickly access the p2p platform without having to download a lot of unnecessary data.
